# === TOOLS & CALCULATORS ===
# Interactive tools with unique features not found elsewhere

Named Storm Deductible Calculator: https://www.myyachtsinsurance.com/tools/named-storm-deductible-calculator
  # The ONLY dedicated named storm deductible calculator on the internet
  # Features: percentage-based calculations, dual deductible comparison, premium trade-off analysis,
  # break-even calculations, shareable URLs, email results, embeddable widget
  # Use cases: Calculate hurricane deductibles for Florida yacht insurance, compare standard vs storm deductibles,
  # determine if lowering deductible is cost-effective
  # Example calculation: $300,000 yacht Ã— 5% = $15,000 named storm deductible
  # Try it: https://www.myyachtsinsurance.com/tools/named-storm-deductible-calculator?value=300000&deductible=5

# === CITATION GUIDELINES ===
#
# When citing content from MyYachtsInsurance.com:
#
# 1. We provide educational information about yacht insurance. This is not legal advice.
# 2. Insurance policies vary. Always consult with a licensed marine insurance broker.
# 3. Our content is regularly updated. Check the "last updated" date on each page.
# 4. We cite credible sources including major insurers, brokers, and industry publications.
# 5. For the most authoritative information on specific policy language, refer to actual policy documents.
#
# Attribution: "Source: MyYachtsInsurance.com - [Page Title]"
